website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, stila's Smudge Pots offer long wear and attractive colors. A good pick for consumers who like to change up their eye looks.
pros: This gel eyeliner is like having two products in one, thanks to the creamy consistency that can also be used as an eyeshadow
Colors are deeply pigmented and wear for hours
Can be used to create a wide range of looks
cons: Dries quickly, so if you prefer to smudge your eyeliner, you'll need to work fast
Will dry out fairly quickly if the lid isn't put on tightly

customer_reviews.title: Won’t smudge if you cry!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I had a Christmas party to attend with some friends, throughout the course of the night I got very emotional and began to cry. I was very pleased to see that the eyeliner did not go down my face, this product is amazing and will sustain the trial of tears!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love the FRESH Stila Smudge Pots
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Stila Smudge Pots for the last two years. I love the bronze color - it's not too intense for daytime wear. Beautiful and definitely stays on. However, the last two times I've purchased the Smudge Pots on Amazon (most recently from the seller: The Beauty Box), they have been dried out and flaky. That's no good. I'll have to buy these @ Sephora to make sure I'm getting a fresh product, because they do tend to dry out after a couple of months even if you do get a good/fresh batch.
customer_reviews.author: Bioprof86

customer_reviews.title: Good liner
customer_reviews.text: Package came in good condition, no damnage. Good pigment, decent size.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brown eyeliner. It never smudges and lasts all day. I use an flat tipped eyeliner brush to tap it on rather than using a stroking motion, then I use a cotton swab to smudge and blend the color. The pigment is very intense so a little goes a long way if using it for eye shadow. As others have mentioned, it does dry out eventually, but it lasts for months so I just buy a new one when that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Rossano

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed with the quality of this product. At first it was so soft and gelly I couldn't apply it, now it's so hard I have to scrape it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexy MUA

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if I got a bad batch or not, but this was not a good eyeliner for me. It’s very thick, a little dry, and it flakes like crazy. Both times I tried to use it I spent half an hour in the mirror picking pieces out of my eyeballs. Not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: kkTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Another amazing Stila product...
customer_reviews.text: I used to be a loyal user of Stila's Stay All Day Liquid Eyeliner Pen, but I'd get a little frustrated that by the end of the day, it wouldn't look so sharp and clean as it did when first applied. I decided to switch to the Smudge Pot applied with a nano brush and I will NEVER go back. It looks sharp and clean all day, applies easily to both top and bottom lid, and glides on even more smoothly than the pen. I haven't tried the other colors, but the black is perfect for me and I have had zero problems with it drying out. Very happy with my purchase, as I am with most Stila products.
customer_reviews.author: apodtoo

customer_reviews.title: Good product but choosing the right brush is key
customer_reviews.text: The trick is finding the brush that works best for in applying, after 3 different ones I finally found one that worked well for me. Don't leave it open, it will dry out. It wears very well, doesn't smudge and washes off easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Aguilar

customer_reviews.text: i love stila eyeliners and this one is defiantly now one of the usuals i will buy, i usually have liner that starts to leak in the corners of my eye ( i know ewe right) so i started trying to avoid my water line completely its made it a lot easier so i don't know if thats the reason this lasted on me so much longer without the leaky corners but i would recommend this to those who love dark dark black eyeliners
customer_reviews.author: Manni

customer_reviews.title: Dry - not good
customer_reviews.text: This smudge pot came extremely dry and pretty much unusable. I usually don't write reviews - actually, this is my first Amazon review, but this product is so bad, it's worth spending part of my day writing a review on it. I decided to splurge on some make up, and I was excited to receive it, but it turned out to be way worse than any drug store make up I've ever used. I would never purchase this product/brand again. I'd return it if it weren't such a pain in the butt to so. Instead, I just threw it away. I'd give it zero starts, but that was not an option.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: My go-to gel liner! STILA
customer_reviews.text: The best gel liner for those who want BLACK. Compared to MAC Blacktrack it is a denser, sootier black. Use with a light hand in daytime and go for it at night. Lasts and stays right where you want it. Also can be smudged well while it sets, a nice day look.
customer_reviews.author: 9 Ravens

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Easy to apply with finger, I use it as a shadow in the summer for a simple, easy shimmer. This with a tinted spf is perfect for the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Silkman

customer_reviews.title: I cried all the way home
customer_reviews.text: I guess I'm allergic to it. Eyes watered every time. Took a break, used something else, then went back. Same result. Wasn't as black as I expected either. Pretty pricy too. Maybe someone else in the house can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: I will never use another liner
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this liner!! It will last all day no smears (as long as you use the appropriate eyeshadow primer) It is easy to apply and it comes with a nice thin brush for the perfect cat-eye look
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Smudge Pot for a long time. I put it on in the morning with a good eyeliner brush and it stays put all day. I've tried other eyeliners but I always go back to Smudge Pot.
customer_reviews.author: muffet

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why this liner gets such good reviews. It's not bad, but I I found nothing special about it. A couple drugstore gel eyeliners I've tried and found to be just as good as this one are L'oreal Infallible and Maybelline Eye Expert. As fa as high end products go, I'd take MAC Fluidline over this one any day, even though it dries out rather quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Applies like a dream.
customer_reviews.text: Smooth and creamy texture and dries down black. Love love love. My mac black track keeps drying out so i changed to stila.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Rampersad

customer_reviews.title: Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color & how smooth & easy it was 2 apply but after only a few minutes of wearing it started 2 run. Everyone does not have this problem so if u don't then u will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Judy W.

customer_reviews.title: Is Satan working somewhere and decided to discontinue this to watch us cry?
customer_reviews.text: WHY IS THIS DISCONTINUED?! It was the BEST every day eyeshadow aaaaand liner. I used it literally every day. And now, it's all gone. IT WAS ALL FOR NOTHING! Life is no longer fun, birds chirping now sound like pain, and children's laughter just reminds me of how good things used to be. When Stila smudge pots in Kitten were still around....
customer_reviews.author: Katya Rozetka

customer_reviews.title: Love their products
customer_reviews.text: I've not find Stila products disappointing. This liner (with the proper brush) goes on smooth and stays all day. I wear it for my Zumba class, and running. The color stays in place -- no running, no smearing. Love their products!
customer_reviews.author: just4mary

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Liner
customer_reviews.text: I wear contacts, and constantly have issues with liners ending up under my eye. One of my biggest pet peeves. This stuff is awesome! Goes on smoothly, and stays on all day long. I actually had to take out my contact after applying it one morning, when I put the lens back in, no smears!! C'mon, that never happens. I'm hooked. Doesn't feel heavy or anything. Amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.author: The Payne's

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Loveeeeeeee this eyeliner. It’s a huge pot, smooth gel formula, quick drying and doesn’t run. Love STILA!
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: smudge pots
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using smudge pots for at least a few years & love them, i think its super easiest eyeliner to use thats versatile and looks really good. I love that they last forever too, the only problem is a little goes such a long way that the remaining product dries up after several months (and does NOT apply well once it kind of dries up). So really one smudge pot could last me over a year if the container was able to preserve it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I received this product used.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product it had been clearly already used. The make-up was half gone and someone had poked eye liner brush marks already in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerri J. Elasion

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm using my husband's account. I love this eyeliner. I have several different brands and this is my favorite. It's so creamy and smooth. It glides on without a problem. Last all day. I will order more as soon as I start getting low and I want more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product. It goes on smooth and creamy but I have doubts about its staying power. It seems to flake away easily unless you put on 3 or 4 layers. Anyone have tips on how to make this stuff stay on all day? I do put on eye shadow primer first, but it doesn't seem to help.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Dried Out and Smudges Off
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, dry, and smudges. Such a waste, its hard to get it on a brush and even harder to get it off the brush and onto my eyelid. Then it's annoying to look in the mirror and see that it has rubbed off and onto my brow bone (not attractive, btw).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hope

customer_reviews.title: Shimmery tan color
customer_reviews.text: My favorite all time eye shadow and now it’s discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Kendyl

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a soft pink but it's more of a sparkly gold and goes on cakey. It wasn't what I was looking for and I don't think the online description is very accurate. it's too bad because I do line most of the Stila line.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this so as soon as it came I popped it open. The packaging was covered in sticky glue. (And still is because I can't seem to figure out where is coming from) It totally dried out after only two weeks. Turned clumpy and hard and won't go on smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Becki Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Had Better
customer_reviews.text: The product package was sticky. The color does not apply smoothly though it is quite water resistant. Get the L'Oreal Infallible instead. It's cheaper with a better application and it comes with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: hmc

customer_reviews.title: love but gets dry
customer_reviews.text: works really really well. doesn't smudge and stays on great. only problem is that it tends to dry up after a while.other than that, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Akemi

customer_reviews.title: applies easily, and stays on
customer_reviews.text: I understand the cult-following. This product is gorgeous, applies easily, and stays on! Will continue to use this product.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Good Stila product but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product, but it dries out quickly even with the top kept on after every use. This makes is even more pricey.
customer_reviews.author: scumble

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous liner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this liner, and it I great with my lash extensions.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Liberatore

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING product and line!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Stays on all day at work and even through workouts and sweating. Amazing product! i will never buy another eyeliner as long as i live. Stila is my favorite makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Sum

customer_reviews.title: so bummed
customer_reviews.text: I love the original Smudge Pot that I bought as part of a set from Sephora years ago. Even though the black was half the size of this one it lasted for years without drying up (not exaggerating). When I first opened the package it was already dried out quite a bit and was difficult to apply. I'm not sure why since this should be the same product. Thinking about sending it back if possible
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Altmann

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This goes on really smooth and looks great, but beware of the cat-eye smudge.
customer_reviews.author: Kasi Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not last. Did not apply smoothly. Going back to Clinique brush on liner.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: ... as dark as expected and doesn't stay all day like my
customer_reviews.text: Not as dark as expected and doesn't stay all day like my inglot
customer_reviews.author: C Magee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. It does not say it's waterproof but the line lasts all day without re-apply.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyeliner. I love that it stays on all ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner. I love that it stays on all day and gives a nice dark black color. Works great to use for wing-tipped liner for a cat eye look
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and use it repeatedly
customer_reviews.text: Love it and use it repeatedly. It does dry out over about 3-4 mos so I have to buy a new one about 1/3 to 1/2 the way through
customer_reviews.author: San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a litte shimmer
customer_reviews.text: I like to use this for an extra shimmer in the corner of my eyes every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Mika Kaneko

customer_reviews.title: Use it fast!
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous for the first week after you open the pot. Then the product dries and becomes unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Burke

customer_reviews.title: A little dryv
customer_reviews.text: Nice color but a dry piece always ended up floating around in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.  Glides on, stays put.  Nothing better.
customer_reviews.text: Frequent purchaser of this product. 1 word of caution, keep it covered every moment you can. Dries out quickly. I put the cover on between every stroke and have no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janine W.

customer_reviews.title: kitten eyeloner
customer_reviews.text: very pretty sparkly color, goes on great, I use in the corner of my eye, and underneath my black eyeliner on the bottom of my eyes and makes my green eyes pop, stays on all day. love this.
customer_reviews.author: Lauriellen Stephens

customer_reviews.title: ... used other gel liners and this one goes on easy and stays put all day
customer_reviews.text: I've used other gel liners and this one goes on easy and stays put all day. It looks like it'll last me a lifetime as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: multitasking product
customer_reviews.text: These is a great color to use as an eye shadow base, but it can be used all by itself as well. Very creamy, doesn't crease.
customer_reviews.author: Ghoulscout

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got was dried out, contacted the seller and they quickly sent me another one. I was pleased with how much they care about their customers, but even with that, the product still isn't up to the standards I expect from this company. This is very hard to apply with the glitter in it. Unlike the black one, it doesn't just glide on. I was disappointed because the color looks so cool. If you have a good brush it will still work. Just take a lot of effort and not as sleek or crisp as the plain black colour from this company. In the future I won't buy this style but I still love this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Have used this for years and it is the only one I will ever use. Stays put! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Williams

customer_reviews.title: It stays on
customer_reviews.text: It stays on and I like that part - but it dries out to fast in the pot, even though I close it every time I fill my brush.
customer_reviews.author: LaWanda Rowen

customer_reviews.title: Smudge less
customer_reviews.text: Will last a long time! Goes on easy with eyeliner brush. Lasts all day without smudging. I do put on urban decay primer first.
customer_reviews.author: nickel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great at first but after a few months it dries up and you can't apply it anymore... :(
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel eye liner and have been using it for years. It stays on all day long, no problems, no smudging on my oily eyelids. Yes, it does harden up in the pot before it is all used up, but you still get a terrific amount of uses from it. It is worth throwing away some of the product to have the great color and staying power of this liner.
customer_reviews.author: aunt karen

customer_reviews.title: All dried up
customer_reviews.text: MY pot arrived all dried up. Some contents had even spilled down the outside of the pot and dried. It looks like it has been in this state for some time. I'm unable to use it unfortunately. As I live so far away its not worth sending back. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Consistency changes over time. Becomes harder to apply after a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: You def. need the right brush for this product. I suggest Sephora for such a purchase. However, when this item is on it is staying on, it does not smudge when it is dried, even if you sweat....Overall, great purchase and worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Stila eyeliner - great color, stays on very well, gel stays soft enough to use
customer_reviews.text: Stila puts a bead of what seems to be a rubber cement-type substance on their jars so when you seal the jar, it is airtight. As a result the gel doesn't dry out as quickly as competitive products (like Bobbie Brown's eyeliner gel).
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: ... negative about this product is that it dries out pretty fast. Would recommend making sure you put the ...
customer_reviews.text: The only negative about this product is that it dries out pretty fast. Would recommend making sure you put the lid on really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about purchasing this product. Looked to be exactly what I wanted. Then I tried it. The color gray was too dark, almost black. Very difficult to apply. I will say, it lasts all day and doesn't rub off. But It took me a long time to get it even close to how I wanted it to look. I would not recommend this product to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fran

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Stila Smudge Pots are an awesome gel eyeliner that works great w/ contacts and stays all day. They grey color is very neutral for my fair skin and light eyes. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Howdy3

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great base for eyeshadow colors. You have to work in it a bit, but once it's well blended it looks beautiful. I love it! It works great with all skin tones as well.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: somewhat too dark
customer_reviews.text: It is good except the color is a little bit too dark. I thought i would be somewhat sparkle for I knew the product from youtube makeup tutorial and it looks darker than the one the person what uses in the video. But anyway it is good.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: loveeeee
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeliner so much. It is really worth every penny. IT doesn't smudge and it is long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Black Cat - Sparkles!
customer_reviews.text: The Black Cat version of this has sparkles.. I much prefer the basic black.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Stila Smudge Pot black gel liner
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, I use it for eyeliner, it doesn't smudge or flake, stays on until you remove take it off..
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Stila Smudge Pot Liner
customer_reviews.text: Kitten is a good color to smooth out and lighten dark lids. The shade gives a soft pearl-like appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and love it, I wear it everyday and it does not smear at all for the full day....
customer_reviews.author: Lucy burgos

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to get a smooth line. I have read other reviews and people have said it has taken them several tries to apply with just the right brush. Well what brush it that??
customer_reviews.author: jules

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend is happy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my girl friend and she loves the quality and consistency of the product. Ordering through Amazon was a breeze and the seller ships very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chen

customer_reviews.title: ... after 1 year of use but the formula is amazing. I only applied once
customer_reviews.text: Mine dried out after 1 year of use but the formula is amazing. I only applied once. It was easy to glide on and very very lasting on the eyelids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Vo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was an actual jet black liner. Instead it has glitters in it. Lots of glitters. I'm never gonna use this liner :(
customer_reviews.author: Brinz

customer_reviews.title: alright
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I just don't know how to put it on, or it just goes on to thick, sorry I couldn't help more.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M.

customer_reviews.title: love em
customer_reviews.text: I wear pretty heavy eye makeup on a daily basis. I love the Smudge Pots b/c you can apply them sparingly or an enhancement effect or lay it on thick for a more intense look. They have great consistency that's easy to manipulate and the color gets deeper the more you use. Be sure to let it dry, because they can smudge (in a bad way)
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

product_meta.title: stila Smudge Pot
product_meta.description: Color:GrayThe verdict is in, and smudge pots take the prize for sexy eyes! This unique gel eyeliner and shadow is an innovative alternative to traditional powder and liquid formulas. This clever little gel has an inky intensity that leaves powder shadows in the dust. A favorite for the sultry, smoky eye. Apply with a liner brush for razor-sharp precision or smudge it with your fingers for more complete coverage. Remember to always close the airtight lid to keep the gel soft and pliable.
